Grouped date accessors

Source: R/grouped_date_accessors.R
grate_accessors.Rd

Generics and methods to work with grouped date objects:

  • get_week() returns the corresponding week values for a yrwk vector.

  • get_year() returns the year.

  • get_firstday() returns the firstday attribute of a yrwk object.

  • get_month() returns the month.

get_week(x, ...)

# S3 method for default
get_week(x, ...)

# S3 method for yrwk
get_week(x, ...)

get_month(x, ...)

# S3 method for default
get_month(x, ...)

# S3 method for yrmon
get_month(x, style = c("numeric", "named"), ...)

get_quarter(x, ...)

# S3 method for default
get_quarter(x, ...)

# S3 method for yrqtr
get_quarter(x, ...)

get_year(x, ...)

# S3 method for default
get_year(x, ...)

# S3 method for yrwk
get_year(x, ...)

# S3 method for yrmon
get_year(x, ...)

# S3 method for yrqtr
get_year(x, ...)

# S3 method for yr
get_year(x, ...)

get_firstday(x, ...)

# S3 method for default
get_firstday(x, ...)

# S3 method for yrwk
get_firstday(x, ...)

# S3 method for period
get_interval(x, days = FALSE, ...)

# S3 method for int_period
get_interval(x, days = FALSE, ...)

# S3 method for yrwk
get_interval(x, days = FALSE, ...)

# S3 method for yrmon
get_interval(x, days = FALSE, ...)

# S3 method for yrqtr
get_interval(x, days = FALSE, ...)

# S3 method for yr
get_interval(x, days = FALSE, ...)

get_firstdate(x, ...)

# S3 method for default
get_firstdate(x, ...)

# S3 method for period
get_firstdate(x, ...)

# S3 method for int_period
get_firstdate(x, ...)

Arguments

x

A yrwk, yrmon, yrqtr or period object.
...

Not used.
style

Either "numeric" (default) for the integer month value or "named" to return the abbreviated month name in the current locale.
days

Should periods be converted in to a number of days.

Examples

x <- as_yrwk(Sys.Date())
get_year(x)

#> [1] 2021
get_week(x)

#> [1] 7
get_firstday(x)

#> [1] 1
